resources.string: Zip file creation has been canceled
Do you want to save the log to file?
Do you want to erase the log?
Do you want to disable the log?
Do you want to enable the log?
By enabling it, the application log will be recorded. Tap "Send logs to developers" after performing operations such as synchronization and recording errors.
The log file is empty and can not be sent to the developer. Tap "Send logs to developers" after performing operations such as synchronization and recording errors.
Send log file to the developer.

Send log file by E-Mail to the developer.
 1.Press the Preview button to see the temp_log.txt, then please check the contents.(If the selection screen of the application is displayed, and then select the FAVORIT application to display the text file.)
 2.When you are finished reading file to send, then select the E-Mail in EMail selection dialog.
 3.Enter the message in the EMAIL body if necessary. (The log file is attached with compressed into zip and )
Application that displays the text file was not found.
